input.rewritten_query: 查询本周学生出勤异常情况

output.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.student_no, student.real_name, course.course_name, attendance.status FROM student JOIN enroll ON student.id = enroll.student_id JOIN course_class ON enroll.course_class_id = course_class.id JOIN course ON course_class.course_id = course.id JOIN attendance ON student.id = attendance.student_id AND course_class.id = attendance.course_class_id WHERE attendance.status IN ('缺勤', '迟到', '早退', '请假未批', '旷课') AND attendance.attend_date >= '2024-06-10' AND attendance.attend_date <= '2024-06-16' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND enroll.is_deleted = 0 AND course_class.is_deleted = 0 AND course.is_deleted = 0 AND attendance.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.student_no, base.real_name, base.course_name, base.status FROM base GROUP BY base.student_no, base.real_name, base.course_name, base.status

entity_mappings.value: 缺勤, 迟到, 早退, 请假未批, 旷课
entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“出勤状态（出勤/缺勤/请假等）”映射
根据时间范围过滤条件映射
